== Description ==

Add a user to the Super admin user list in WordPress Multisite

== Usage ==

%%% <?php grant_super_admin( $user_id ); ?> %%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$user_id|integer|The user ID to grant super admin privileges}}

== Returns ==
; (BOOLEAN) : True if successful, false otherwise

Since: [[Version 3.0|Wordpress 3.0.0]]
